meanings.definition: Unable to be avoided or prevented.
meanings.sent1: Wearing a helmet is unavoidable for safety reasons.
meanings.sent2: It was unavoidable that the sun would rise in the morning.
meanings.sent3: It's unavoidable to laugh when tickled on the feet.
meanings.sent4: The truth is an unavoidable light that shines through darkness.
meanings.sent5: The storm clouds gathered, an unavoidable sign of the impending rain.

meanings.sent1: Getting wet in the rain is unavoidable without an umbrella.
meanings.sent2: Death is an unavoidable part of the cycle of life.
meanings.sent3: It's unavoidable to smile when seeing a puppy wag its tail.
meanings.sent4: The passage of time is an unavoidable force that shapes our lives.
meanings.sent5: The avalanche was an unavoidable force of nature, unstoppable and fierce.
